local_intent: Ensure t_block is visible, align and set yaw, execute primary 0.2m push at 90 deg, then re-detect the block.
assumptions: t_block is reachable for ApproachAndAlign from current pose
Yaw=90 aligns push toward goal direction for this scene
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence around the transfer phase: perceive t_block, align, set yaw=90, push 0.2 at 90 deg, verify via DetectObject.
